alert.note: Alert for St. Joseph (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 24 at 6:53PM EST until December 25 at 10:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST /9 AM CST/ SUNDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. * WHERE...In Indiana, Northern La Porte, Eastern St. Joseph IN and Western St. Joseph IN Counties. In Michigan, St. Joseph MI County. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST /9 AM CST/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
